animeDescription: Son-Goku is a monkey who was born from a stone and is endowed with magical powers. He gets carried away and goes on a rampage until at last Buddha confines him within Mt. Gogyo. Saved by Sanzohoshi, Son-Goku accompanies him on a journey to India. But on their way, monsters lie in wait for them.  (Source: BakaBT)
animeRelated: ['Gokuu no Daibouken', 'Saiyuuki', 'Saiyuuki: Son Gokuu Monogatari', 'Tezuka Osamu Monogatari: Boku wa Son Gokuu', 'Son Gokuu Silk Road wo Tobu!!', 'Son Gokuu no Hi no Youjin', 'Son O-gong gwa Byeoldeul-ui Jeonjaeng']
